includedAssets.title: National Treasure
includedAssets.synopsis: Producer Jerry Bruckheimer does 'The Da Vinci Code' without actually securing the rights with this treasure-hunting adventure that sees Nicolas Cage in full hangdog hero mode. Ever since Grandpa told him the story, Benjamin (Cage) has been seeking a mythical treasure trove, amassed over centuries and well-hidden by America's founding fathers. Unfortunately the latest clue requires him to steal the Declaration of Independence, which is about as easy as nicking the Crown Jewels...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nicolas Cage hunts for a legendary treasure that's been hidden for centuries. Unfortunately, villain Sean Bean is after the loot too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Producer Jerry Bruckheimer does 'The Da Vinci Code' without actually securing the rights with this treasure-hunting adventure that sees Nicolas Cage in full hangdog hero mode. Ever since Grandpa told him the story, Benjamin (Cage) has been seeking a mythical treasure trove, amassed over centuries and well-hidden by America's founding fathers. Unfortunately the latest clue requires him to steal the Declaration of Independence, which is about as easy as nicking the Crown Jewels...

includedAssets.title: National Treasure: Book Of Secrets
includedAssets.synopsis: Adventurer Nicolas Cage is plunged into an adrenaline-fuelled quest to prove his ancestor was not an assassin. Spectacular popcorn fun with Helen Mirren.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nicolas Cage is plunged into another adrenaline-fuelled quest in this adventure sequel with Helen Mirren and Ed Harris.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Adventurer Nicolas Cage is plunged into an adrenaline-fuelled quest to prove his ancestor was not an assassin. Spectacular popcorn fun with Helen Mirren.

includedAssets.title: National Treasure Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Eccentric treasure hunter Nicolas Cage joins forces with computer expert Justin Bartha, National Archives worker Diane Kruger and his estranged father Jon Voight to find a treasure his family has been hunting for generations, with FBI agent Harvey Keitel and mercenary Sean Bean in hot pursuit. Years later, he must decipher the clues in a lost fragment of John Wilkes Booth's diary to stop Ed Harris's black market dealer framing his ancestor for masterminding the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. Smash-hit action-adventure double-bill.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nicolas Cage's eccentric Ben Gates uses historical knowledge and code-cracking skills to hunt for treasure. Smash-hit action-adventure double-bill.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Eccentric treasure hunter Nicolas Cage joins forces with computer expert Justin Bartha, National Archives worker Diane Kruger and his estranged father Jon Voight to find a treasure his family has been hunting for generations, with FBI agent Harvey Keitel and mercenary Sean Bean in hot pursuit. Years later, he must decipher the clues in a lost fragment of John Wilkes Booth's diary to stop Ed Harris's black market dealer framing his ancestor for masterminding the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. Smash-hit action-adventure double-bill.

includedIn.title: National Treasure
includedIn.synopsis: A treasure hunter races to find a war chest hidden by the Founding Fathers that his family has been seeking for generations. Years later, when one of his ancestors is implicated in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln, he must follow a series of clues in the diary of John Wilkes Booth to prove his innocence.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A treasure hunter searches for a chest hidden by the Founding Fathers, then tries to disprove his ancestor’s involvement in Abraham Lincoln’s death.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A treasure hunter races to find a war chest hidden by the Founding Fathers that his family has been seeking for generations. Years later, when one of his ancestors is implicated in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln, he must follow a series of clues in the diary of John Wilkes Booth to prove his innocence.
